name: Pull Yourself Together (Bird With Toes)
description:
Created for the 14th Toronto Game Jam Pull yourself together to get the Goat Trophy of Winners.

Keyboard Controls:

  • Arrows - Move
  • Z - Jump
  • X - Split/Merge/Switch Parts
  • C - Pick Up/Use
  • ESC - Pause/Quit

X-Box 360 controls

  • Start - Pause
  • D-Pad or Left Stick - Move
  • A - Jump
  • Y - Split/Merge/Switch Parts
  • X- Pick Up/Use

Other gamepads untested at this time
